title: Hand Habits - Fun House
description: Meg Duffy released their new Hand Habis album, it features guest vocals by Perfume Genius.
release: Fun House was released on Saddle Creek on October 22, 2020.

title: Olafur Arnalds - The Invisible
release: The Invisible was released on Mercury KX on October 22, 2020.

title: Grouper - Shade
description: Grouper (Liz Harris) released the 12th album, it is a collection of new songs that were made over the past 15 years.
release: Shade was released on Kranky on October 22, 2021.

title: Of All Living Things - On Familiar Ground
description: Dublin based dreampop band Of All Living Things released their new ep titled On Familiar Ground.
release: On Familiar Ground was released on October 8, 2021.

title: Sin Fang - Foscad
description: Sin Fang's film score for Foscad is now available on streaming platforms.
release: Foscad was released on INNI on October 8, 2021.

title: Efterklang - Windflowers
description: the Danish trio Efterklang released a new nine track lp.
release: Windflowers was released on City Slang on October 8, 2021.

title: Sufjan Stevens & Angelo De Augustine - A Beginner's Mind
description: Sufjan Stevens <3.
release: A Beginner's Mind was released on Asthmatic Kitty on September 24, 2021.

title: Robert Levon Been - The Card Counter
description: Robert Levon Been (Black Rebel Motorcycle Club) new album features original songs composed and recorded for Paul Schrader’s new film, The Card Counter.

title: Low - HEY WHAT
description: still not dead. and, still not sounding the same after 27 years. Low released their 13th album.
release: HEY WHAT was released on Sub Pop Records on September 10, 2021.

title: Sir Simon - Repeat Until Funny, Burkini Beach - Best Western
description: Simon Frontzek is back with a new lp after ten years. Rudi Maier (Burkini Beach) released a new lp as well. they co-produced each other and even wrote a song together (Not Coming Home) which can be found on both albums.
release: Repeat Until Funny and Best Western were released on GHvC on August 27, 2021.

title: Angus & Julia Stone - Life Is Strange
description: Angus & Julia Stone released a new album after almost four years. it is the soundtrack to the upcoming video game, Life Is Strange: True Colors. here is the acoustic version of the opening track.
release: Life Is Strange was released on BMG on August 20, 2021.

title: Devendra Banhart, Noah Georgeson - Refuge
description: Devendra Banhart and Noah Georgeson have teamed up on a new ambient album. Noah Georgeson who has procuded albums of Devendra Banhart in the past, now composed and recorded 12 tracks with him.
release: Refuge was released on Dead Oceans on August 13, 2021.

title: Low Roar - Maybe Tomorrow
description: Ryan Karazija released his fifth lp entitled Maybe Tomorrow. it contains 12 tracks.

title: Womb - Holding a Flame
description: dreampop from New Zealand.
release: Holding a Flame was released on Flying Nun Records on July, 2021.

title: Traitrs - The Sick, Tired and Ill
description: post punk from Toronto. the duo released a new six track ep.
release: The Sick, Tired and Ill was released on Freakwave on July 30, 2021.

title: A Place to Bury Strangers - Hologram
description: Brooklyn-based A Place to Bury Strangers released a new ep, consisting of five shoegaze tracks.
release: Hologram was released on Dedstrange on July 16, 2021.

title: Midpoint Union - Displacement Patterns
description: Midpoint Union is Portugal-based Pedro R. he recorded his new album in his home studio.
release: Displacement Patterns was self released on July 3, 2021.

title: Midwife - Luminol
description: new heaven metal from Colorado! recorded with amongst others with the three members of DIIV.
release: Luminol was released on The Flenser on july 16, 2021.

title: Daniel Avery - Together In Static
description: Daniel Avery released a new lp, it is comprised of music created for his live show at London’s Hackney Church on May 29.
release: Together In Static was released on Mute Records on june 24, 2021.

title: Max Cooper - Maps
description: Max Cooper's released a new four-track ep. he collaborated with classical Indian vocalist Samad Khan. the opening track Weakness Of The Flesh scores a dance choreography by Jacob Jonas dance company and dancer Emma Rosenzweig-Bock. it is part of the films.dance project.
release: Maps was released on Mesh on June 24, 2021.

title: Slut - Talks of Paradise
description: Slut, finally, after 8 years of silence.
release: Talks of Paradise was released on Lookbook on June 18, 2021.

title: Andy Bell - All on You
description: Andy Bell (Ride, Oasis) released a four track ep, featuring acoustic versions originally recorded for radio sessions.
release: All on You was released on Sonic Cathedral Recordings on June 11, 2021.

title: Maxi Pongratz, Micha Acher & Verstärkung
description: Maxi Pongratz, Micha Acher, Theresa Loibl, Maria Hafner, Cico Beck, Agnes Liberta, Timm Kornelius, Matthias Meichelböck and Alois Schmelz
release: Musik für Flugräder was released on Trikont on June 11, 2021.

title: Masayoshi Fujita - Bird Ambience
description: Japanese vibraphonist, multi-percussionist and composer Masayoshi Fujita released his new lp Bird Ambience.
release: Bird Ambience was released on Erased Tapes on May 28, 2021.

title: Tape Waves - Bright
description: Tape Waves are Kim and Jarod Weldin, they are based in South Carolina and just released their third lp.
release: Bright was released on Emotional Response Records on June 4, 2021.

title: Slowly - Reverse
description: Toronto-based diy person Charly Berger released the forgotten "left over" tracks from his album Reveal. they made it onto his new ep Reverse.
release: Reverse was released on Lossleader Records on June 4, 2021.

title: Marissa Nadler - Instead of Dreaming
description: Marissa Nadler's new album includes eight covers, wrapped in two original songs. she covers Bob Dylan, Bee Gees and Metallica, among others.
release: Instead of Dreaming was released on Bella Union on May 7, 2021.

title: happy birthday, Bob!
description: I was so much older then I'm younger than that now.

title: Indigo Sparke - Echo
description: Australian musician Indigo Sparke released her debug lp, it was co-produced by Adrianne Lenker (Big Thief).
release: Echo was released on Sacred Bones on May 21, 2021.

title: Lea Porcelain - Choirs to Heaven
description: Berlin based synth pop/post punk duo Lea Porcelain released the second album.
release: Choirs to Heaven was released on Lea Porcelain Recordings on May 21, 2021.

title: Aloa Input - Devil's Diamond Memory Collection
description: Munich-based supergroup Aloa Input (Cico Beck, Florian Kreier, Marcus Grassl) released their third lp. we are looking forward to seeing them performing live soon. hopefully.
release: Devil's Diamond Memory Collection was released on Siluh Records on May 14, 2021.

title: You, Nothing - Lonely // Lovely
description: shoegaze/dreampop from Italy!
release: Lonely // Lovely was released on Floppy Dischi on May 7, 2021.

title: Will Stratton - The Changing Wilderness
description: Will Stratton released his seventh studio album, mixed and engineered by himself. it contains 10 tracks.
release: The Changing Wilderness was released on Bella Union on May 7, 2021.

title: Flatsound - on a tv that no one saw
description: songwriter Mitch Welling released a new six track ep.
release: on a tv that no one saw was released on April 23, 2021.

title: Ja, Panik - Die Gruppe
description: we are lucky that Andreas Spechtl, the most sophisticated DEnglish singer since Falco after some also very promising solo projects finally decided to release another album with his group Ja, Panik again. the dystopian songs maybe even fit a bit too well to the current situation. although they were all written before it. they are also accompanied by a modular synthesizer and a saxophone now. and they even manage to let that sound neither jazzy nor cheesy 80s careless whisperish. with that they proof that there is still some beauty left in this world. even if it’s only within.
release: Die Gruppe was released on Buereau B on April 30, 2021.

title: Fabrizio Paterlini - LifeBlood
description: Fabrizio Paterlini released the second part of his album LifeBlood. the first part Life was already released earlier this year, it contains solo piano arrangments. the second part is more of a cinematic nature..
release: LifeBlood was released on Memory Recording on April 30, 2021.

title: MØAA - Euphoric Recall
description: Euphoric Recall is MØAA’s debut lp. Jancy Rae began writing and recording demos in seattle, she then moved to Venice and finished recording in collaboration with Andrea Volpato.
release: Euphoric Recall was released on WWNBB (We Were Never Being Boring) Collective on April 2, 2021.

title: Small Black - Cheap Dreams
description: Brooklyn-based Small Black released a new lp titled Cheap Dreams. it is their first record in five years.
release: Cheap Dreams was released on 100% electronica on April 9, 2021.

title: Sufjan Stevens - Meditations
description: Sufjan Stevens release the first volumne of his Convocations series. it is called Meditations. Lamentations, Revelations, Celebrations, and Incantations — will be released in April and May. Convocations is a tribute to his biological father, who died in September 2020.

title: Bell Orchestre - House Music
description: Canadian instrumentalists Bell Orchestre released a new lp in over a decade. House Music is a largely improvised album, recorded in one session.
release: House Music was released on Erased Tapes on March 29, 2021.

title: Nils Frahm - Graz
description: 88 days, 88 keys, and a new Nils Frahm album released on Piano Day 2021.
release: Graz was released on Erased Tapes on March 29, 2021.

title: The Antlers - Green to Gold
description: The Antlers are back with their first album in seven years.
release: Green to Gold was released on Transgressive Records on March 26, 2021.

title: Xiu Xiu - OH NO
description: duets! the new Xiu Xiu album features collaborations with Sharon Van Etten, Chelsea Wolfe, Owen Pallett, Drab Majesty and many more.
release: OH NO was released on Polyvinyl Records on March 26, 2021.

title: Scyr - So Sad
description: lost in 80s. new wave from munich.
release: So Sad was released on March 19, 2021.

title: Max Black - The Outside
description: Philadelphia based shoegaze!
release: The Outside was released on January 1, 2021.

title: Homespun Retrospect
description: our dear deer Lens Arc contributed to a Deerhunter cover compiliaton. his interpretation of Cryptograms is one of ten very unique Deerhunter homages.
release: Homespun Retrospect was released on March 6, 2021.

title: Alice Gift - Alles ist Gift
description: Alice Gift (Velvet Condom, Liste Noire) released the debug album Alles ist Gift.
release: Alles ist Gift was released on Cymbeline Records on February 26, 2021.

title: A Winged Victory for the Sullen - Invisible Cities
description: neoclassical-ambient duo of Adam Wiltzie and Dustin O’Halloran released their fourth album, the score to a theatre production directed by London Olympics ceremony video designer Leo Warner.
release: Invisible Cities was released on their own Artificial Pinearch Manufacturing label on February 26, 2021.

title: Fabrizio Paterlini - Life
description: Fabrizio Paterlini released the first part of his project LifeBlood. Life contains six intimate and fragile piano tracks. the second part will be out in april.
release: Life was released on Memory Recrodings on February 19, 2021.

title: Animal Collective - Crestone (Original Score)
description: Animal Collective scored a documentary about a group of SoundCloud rappers. animal collective scoring a film about rappers sounds like a contradiction, but works very well. Crestone a film by Marnie Ellen Hertzler.
release: Crestone (Original Score) was released on Domino on February 19, 2021.

title: Mogwai - As The Love Continues
description: 10th studio album. produced by Dave Fridmann
release: As The Love Continues was released via Rock Action Records on February 19, 2021.

title: SUB ROSA - Sub Rosa EP
description: California based Band SUB ROSA released a new ep. beautiful dreamy shoegaze, hardly any information on the internet.
release: Sub Rosa EP was released on February 9, 2021.

title: Still Corners - The Last Exit
description: The Last Exit is the fifth studio album from London based Still Corners.
release: The Last Exit was released on Wrecking Light Records on February 12, 2021.

title: Medio Mutante - Drum Machines and Synthesizers
description: lofi beats and synth by Medio Mutante.
release: Drum Machines and Synthesizers was released on February 1, 2021.

title: Anna B Savage - A Common Turn
description: London based singer songwriter and musician Anna B Savage released her debut lp. it is quite intimate.
release: A Common Turn was released on City Slang on January 29, 2021.

title: The Notwist - Vertigo Days
description: Finally!
release: Vertigo Days was released on Morr Music on January 29, 2021.

title: Motorama - Before The Road
description: Russian post punk band Motorama released their 6th studio album.
release: Before The Road was released on I'm Home Records on January 29, 2021.

title: Widowspeak - Honeychurch
description: after releasing Plum in August last year, Widowspeak is back with a new ep. it features two covers, R.E.M.'s The One I Love and Romeo and Juliet by Dire Straits.
release: Honeychurch was released through Captured Tracks on January 22, 2021.

title: Grandbrothers - All the Unknown
description: Erol Sarp and Lukas Vogel are back with their third lp. as on previous albums, All the Unknown fuses piano sounds and electronics in a beautiful and elegant way. their making of video impressively shows the gear they use to create these warm sounds.
release: All the Unknown was released through City Slang on January 15, 2021.

title: Casper Clausen - Better Way
description: Better Way is Casper Clausen's (Efterklang) debut solo lp, it was recorded by Peter Kember of Sonic Boom and Spaceman 3.
release: Better Way was released through City Slang on January 8, 2021.

title: Dreams of Empire - Encapsulation
description: Jane and Andrew Craig are a Brighton based shoegaze/dreampop couple. they released their second lp.
release: Encapsulation was released through their Duck Race Recording Co label on November 6, 2020.

title: Seasurfer - Zombies
description: Hamburg based shoegaze band seasurfer released their third album - Zombies.
release: Zombies was released on Reptile Music on Dezember 11, 2020.

title: Medio Mutante - 800%
description: 800% is a slow motion remix album of 13 Medio Mutante tracks from the last 13 years. It's over three hours long, it was remixed utilizing digital and analog tools such as microcassette recorders, paulstretch, mammut, max/msp and reel-to-reel tape machines.

title: Max Richter - Beethoven - Opus 2020
description: happy birthday Beethoven!
release: Opus 2020 was released on Deutsche Grammophon on Dezember 17, 2020 - Beethoven's 250th birthday.

title: Nicholas Lens, Nick Cave – L.I.T.A.N.I.E.S
description: Nick Cave has written the libretto for L.I.T.A.N.I.E.S, Nicholas Lens' new opera.
release: L.I.T.A.N.I.E.S was released on Deutsche Grammophon on Dezember 4, 2020.

title: Sigur Rós – Odin’s Raven Magic
description:
finally!
Odin’s Raven Magic is a collaboration between Sigur Rós, Hilmar Örn Hilmarsson, Steindór Andersen and Maria Huld Markan Sigfúsdóttir (Amiina). it was originally premiered during 2002 at London's Barbican centre.
release: Odin’s Raven Magic was released on Krunk on Dezember 4, 2020.

title: Girls in Airports - Dive
description: Girls in Airports released their sixth studio album. they create beautiful soundscapes by combining jazz, indie and urban folk.
release: Dive was released on Mawi Music on November 27, 2020.

title: Chilly Gonzales - ENYA: A Treatise on Unguilty Pleasures
description: Chilly Gonzales released a book about Enya, taste, authenticity. it is available as an audio book as well.

title: Martin Kohlstedt - FLUR
description: Klassik darf alles sein, bloß nicht elitär.
release: FLUR was released on Warner Classics on November 27, 2020.

title: Ane Brun - How Beauty Holds The Hand Of Sorrow
description: Norwegian musician Ane Brun released her eighth album. it is quite different to its predecessor After The Great Strom, which was released last month.
release: How Beauty Holds The Hand Of Sorrow was released on Balloon Ranger Recordings on November 27, 2020.

title: I Am Oak - Odd Seeds (Pt 1)
description: Ultrecht based I Am Oak released a new lp. it contains 14 tracks.
release: Monument was released on Snowstar Records on November 20, 2020.

title: Clara Luzia - 4 + 1
description: Clara Luzia's new ep contains four originals and one cover song.
release: Monument was released on Asinella Records on November 20, 2020.

title: Silent Sex - Ohnmacht
description: based in minga. and very much into c major and reverb. the new silent sex single is available on most major streaming services. don't hesitate to message us for stems, if you want to sample, remix or be otherwise creative with it.
release: Ohnmacht was released on Grantler Records on November 20, 2020.

title: Молчат Дома - Дискотека
description: Molchat Doma are a cold wave band from Belarus. they just released their third studio album.
release: Monument was released on Sacred Bones Records on November 11, 2020.

title: The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick - Ways of Hearing
description: taking their name from a Peter Handke's novel, adapted into Wim Wenders's first feature, The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick is a new Philadelphia based band. their debut Ways of Hearing reminds of early Bright Eyes records.
release: Ways of Hearing was released on Count Your Lucky Stars on October 30, 2020.

title: Kraków Loves Adana - A Night to Remember
description: Kraków Loves Adana are eleasing a new ep, it is a spin-off feature of Darker Darkness, released only a couple of weeks ago. limited vsh style blood red tapes are available on their bandcamp page.
release: A Night to Remember was released on October 30, 2020.

title: Ólafur Arnalds - some kind of peace
description: Icelandic composer and multi instrumentalist Ólafur Arnalds' new album is out now. it features guest appearances from Bonobo, JFDR and Josin.
release: some kind of peace was released on Mercury KX on November 6, 2020.

title: Eels - Earth to Dora
description: Earth to Dora is Eel's thirteenth studio album.
release: Earth to Dora was released E Works/PIAS on October 30, 2020.

title: Stella Sommer - Northern Dancer
description: Stella Sommer (Die Heiterkeit) is providing us a new quarantine soundtrack. the ten tracks on her new album are reduced to the minimal - namely her voice and piano.
release: Northern Dancer was released on her label Northern Dancer Records on October 30, 2020.

title: Lebanon Hanover - Sci-Fi Sky
description: dark wave duo Lebanon Hanover released their new 10 track lp titled Sci-Fi Sky.
release: Sci-Fi Sky was released on Fabrika Records on October 20, 2020.

title: Tomberlin - Projections
description: Sarah Beth's soft voice flys away on a cloud of instruments on her new EP 'Projections'.
release: Projections was released on Saddle Creek on October 16, 2020.

title: Matt Berninger - Serpentine Prison
description: Serpentine Prison is Matt Berninger's (The National) warm, analog, emotional solo debut album.
release: Serpentine Prison was released on Concord on October 16, 2020.

title: Kevin Morby - Sundowner
description: Sundowner is Kevin Morby's sixth solo album. it contains ten honest lofi tracks.
release: Sundowner was released on Dead Oceans on October 16, 2020.

title: Future Islands - As Long As You Are
description: synth pop band Future Island released their sixth lp..
release: As Long As You Are was released on 4AD on October 9, 2020.

title: Penguin Cafe - Handfuls of Night (Explored)
description: Penguin Cafe released a special version of the 2009 piece Handfuls of Night. it includes a track-by-track audio commentary, plus a bonus track. a short making of video can be found here.
release: Handfuls of Night (Explored) was released on Erased Tapes on October 2, 2020.

title: Atli Örvarsson, Sin Fang - Flóra
description: Iceland. emotions.
release: Flóra was released on inni music on October 2, 2020.

title: BlankFor.ms  - Memory
description: BlankFor.ms released a new four track ep, with tape loops, analog synths, glitches and warm textures. for the music production nerds: he explains some production techniques and does gear reviews on his youtube channel.
release: Memory was released on Bidbird on September 8, 2020.

title: Anna von Hausswolff  - All Thoughts Fly
description: Anna von Hausswolff released a new instrumental album, using only one instrument - namely the pipe organ.
release: All Thoughts Fly was released on Southern Lord on September 25, 2020.

title: Kraków Loves Adana - Darker Darkness
description: the duo Kraków Loves Adana are back with a new album, somewhere between dream pop and dark wave.
release: Darker Darkness was self-released on September 25, 2020.

title: Fenne Lily - BREACH
description: Bristol based Fenne Lily released her second album.
release: BREACH was released on Dead Oceans on September 18, 2020.

title: Cut Copy - Freeze, Melt
description: Melbourne based synth pop band Cut Copy released their sixth studio album - called Freeze, Melt.
release: Freeze, Melt was released on Cutters Records on August 21, 2020.

title: Kevin Morby - Campfire
description: first single from Kevin Morby's new album Sundowner, to be released October 16, 2020.
release: Campfire was released on Dead Oceans on September 1, 2020.

title: Jeremy Gara - Passerine Finale
description: Jeremy Gara (Arcade Fire) released his second solo album.
release: Passerine Finale was released on Invada Records on September 11, 2020.

title: Буерак - Компактные откровения
description: Буерак is a post-punk, new Russian wave band from Novosibirsk. they released their fifth studio album.
release: Компактные откровения was released on Свет и Тени on September 5, 2020.

title: Linea Aspera - Linea Aspera LP II
description: London based cold wave duo Linea Aspera (Alison Lewis und Ryan Ambridge) is back with a new lp.
release: Linea Aspera LP II was self-released on September 11, 2020.

title: Shlohmo - Heaven Inc
description: LA based Shlohmo released a new four track ep, full of noises and glitches.
release: Heaven Inc was released on Friends of Friends on September 4, 2020.

title: Lens Arc - Monolith / Receptor
description: Monolith / Receptor by our dear Lens Arc is now available on most streaming services. it was first released in 2016. please feel free to message us if you are interested in tapes.
release: Monolith / Receptor was (re)released through Grantler Records on August 28, 2020.

title: Widowspeak - Plum
description: Brooklyn-based dreampop duo Widowspeak just released their fifth album.
release: Plum was released through Captured Tracks on August 28, 2020.

title: Angel Olsen - Whole New Mess
description: Angel Olsen released a raw and more intimate version of her All Mirrors lp.
release: Whole New Mess was released on Jagjaguwar on August 28, 2020.

title: For Belarus - For Belarus
description: a new compilation, For Belarus, has been released to support the victims of repression and police violence in Belarus. the funds are being sent directly to the Belarus Solidarity Foundation – one of several charitable organisations currently helping the country. it includes tracks by Molly Nilsson, Thomas Azier, Molchat Doma and many more.

title: Bright Eyes - Down in the Weeds, Where the World Once Was
description: Bright Eyes return with their first new album in nine years.
release: Down in the Weeds, Where the World Once Was was released through Dead Oceans on August 21, 2020.

title: Library Tapes - The Quiet City
description: David Wenngren released a new Library Tapes album, it was made in collaboration with many other artists. it contains 10 instrumental tracks.
release: The Quite City was released on his label 1631 Recordings on August 21, 2020.

title: The Notwist - Ship
description: The Notwist released a new ep.
release: Ship was released on Morr Music on August 21, 2020.

title: Meena - EP
description: Manchester based shoegaze duo Meena released their debut ep.
release: EP was self-released in July 2020.

title: Black Marble - I Must Be Living Twice
description: Brooklyn based Chris Stewart release a cover ep, including songs by Wire, Robert Palmer, Grouper and more.
release: I Must Be Living Twice was released on Sacred Bones Records on August 14, 2020.

title: Sin Fang - The Last Shall Be First
description: Reykjavík based Sindri Már Sigfússon (Seabear) released a new album.
release: The Last Shall Be First was released on August 14, 2020.

title: Land of Talk - Indistinct Conversations
description: Land of Talk, the band around lead singer Elizabeth Powell released their fourth album.
release: Indistinct Conversations was released on Saddle Creek Records on July 31, 2020.

title: Alison Mosshart - Sound Wheel
description: Alison Mosshart (The Kills) released her first solo spoken word album, it contains 47 short tracks and it is a companion album to her new book Car Ma.
release: Sound Wheel was released on Third Man Store on Agust 7, 2020.

title: Max Richter - Voices
description: British composer Max Richter released a new album. it features the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, spoken by various people in different languages. he also released an app version of his 2005 piece sleep.
release: Voices was released on Decca Records on July 31, 2020.

title: Ruby Haunt - Tiebreaker
description: LA based Ruby Haunt released a very intimate new album.
release: Tiebreaker was self-released on JuLy 29, 2020.

title: The Notwist - Ship
description: The new The Notwist single is taken from their upcoming ep Ship, out august 21, 2020. it features Saya (Tenniscoats, Spirit Fest) and serves as an outlook to a new upcoming lp.
release: Ship was released on Morr Music on JuLy 31, 2020.

title: Rival Consoles - Articulation
description: English musician Ryan Lee West released his new album Articulation, full with glitches and warm analog synths.
release: Articulation was released through Erased Tapes on JuLy 31, 2020.

title: Lens Arc
description: we re-released Paper Walls by our dear Lens Arc. please feel free to message us if you are interested in tapes.
release: Paper Walls was released on Grantler Records on JuLy 20, 2020.

title: JARV IS... - Beyond the Pale
description: JARV IS… is Jarvis Cocker's new band project. against the original plan of only performing live and not releasing albums, they have taken live recordings and overdubbed them in the studio. They call it an "alive album", rather than a live one [src].
release: Beyond the Pale was released through Rough Trade on JuLy 17, 2020.

title: Nicolas Jaar - Telas
description: Nicolas Jaar released his third album. Telas contains four ambient tracks, each around 15 minutes.
release: Telas was released through Other People on JuLy 17, 2020.

title: Yo La Tengo - We Have Amnesia Sometimes
description: I don't care if Monday's blue. Tuesday's grey and Wednesday too. Thursday, I don't care about you. It's Friday, I'm in love with Yo La Tengo
release: We Have Amnesia Sometimes was released on Matador on JuLy 17, 2020.

title: Zoon - Bleached Wavves
description:
Shoegaze anyone?
Zoon's debut was released last month and it is full of beautiful guitar textures, reverbs and glitches.
release: Bleached Wavves was released on Paper Bag Records on June 19, 2020.

title: Animal Collective - Bridge to Quiet
description: Animal Collective surprisingly released a new ep. Bridge to Quiet contains four tracks, each of them is over seven minutes long.
release: Bridge to Quite was released on Domino Records on July 3, 2020.

title: bdrmm - Bedroom
description: Hull/Leeds based bdrmm released their much anticipated debut Bedroom. it was recorded in Leeds and mastered in Brooklyn by Heba Kadry (Slowdive, Beach House).
release: Bedroom was released on Sonic Cathedral Recordings on July 3, 2020.

title: The Vacant Lots - Interzone
description: NY based psych shoegaze duo released their third album, it is called Interzone.
release: Interzone was released through Fuzz Club on June 26, 2020.

title: Phoebe Bridgers - Punisher
description: singer and songwriter Phoebe Bridgers's (Boygenius, Better Oblivion Community Center) second album has been released.
release: Punisher was released through Dead Oceans on June 18, 2020.

title: Rolling Blackouts Coastal Fever - Sideways to New Italy
description:
guitars <3
the Australian quintet Rolling Blackouts Coastal Fever released their second album. the high expectations after their debut Hope Down have been met.
release: Sideways to New Italy was released through Sub Pop on June 5, 2020.

title: Low Roar - Inure
description: Ryan Karazija is American, lives in Reykjavík and just released a warm and calm new ep.
release: Inure was released on Tonequake Records on June 5, 2020.

title: GoGo Penguin - GoGo Penguin
description: Manchester experimental jazz group GoGo Penguin released their self-titled forth album.
release: GoGo Penguin was released on Blue Note Records on June 5, 2020.

title: Jehnny Beth - To Love Is To Live
description: Jehnny Beth (frontwoman of Savages and half of the lo-fi duo John & Jehn) dropped her solo debut album. it is moving between cinematic and industrial sounds, between power and vulnerability. she and Johnny Hostile also released a collection of erotic short stories, Crimes Against Love Manifesto (C.A.L.M.).
release: To Love Is To Live was released on 20lo7 music on June 12, 2020.

title: Lebanon Hanover - The Last Thing
description: Lebanon Hanover are teasing us with a little two track ep, a full lp will follow later this year.
release: The Last Thing was released on Fabrika Records on May 30, 2020.

title: XTR Human - Interior
description: XTR Human are back with a new post punk/shoegaze/dreampop album.
release: Interior was released on Blackjack Illuminist Records on May 29, 2020.

title: Tame Impala "Borderline" - oder: das Kunstwerk im Zeitalter seiner ständigen Veränderbarkeit
description: Tame lmpala, die gelungene Neohippie-One-Man-Show-Band des Australiers Kevin Parker, hat Anfang des Jahres ihr lang erwartetes viertes Studioalbum „The Slow Rush“ veröffentlicht. Es strahlt ein gleichermaßen melancholisches wie sonnendurchflutetes 70er Jahre Flair aus und ist von Yacht-Rock und elektrischen Supertramp-Pianos inspiriert. Es klingt nach einem besseren und stilvolleren L.A. vergangener Tage, das es so vermutlich nie gegeben hat ...

title: Sonic Boom - All Things Being Equal
description: Pete Kember's new album sounds like a mix of Kraftwerk and Animal Collective. it is the first Sonic Boom album after Spectrum, which was released in 1989. in the meantime, the former Spacemen 3 member produced and collaborated with bands like MGMT, Beach House or Panda Bear and released music as Spectrum or E.A.R. (Experimental Audio Research).
release: All Things Being Equal was released on Carpark Records on June 6, 2020.

title: Owen Pallett - Island
description: Owen Pallett surprises with Island, his first studio album in 6 years. Island was recorded live at Abbey Road Studios with the London Contemporary Orchestra.
release: Island was released on Domino on May 22, 2020.

title: Nation of Language - Introduction, Presence
description: Brooklyn based new wave trio Nation of Language self-released their debut Introduction, Presence.

title: Christian Lee Hutson - Beginners
description: LA based singer songwriter Christian Lee Hutson released his new album Beginners. it contains ten honest and intimate tracks. it was produced by Phoebe Bridgers (Boygenius and Better Oblivion Community Center).
release: Beginners was released on ANTI records on May 29, 2020.

title: Deerhoof - Future Teenage Cave Artists
description: Deerhoof released their 16th studio album. it is as usual unusual.
release: Future Teenage Cave Artists was released through Joyful Noise Recordings on May 29, 2020.

title: Cigarettes After Sex - You're All I Want
description: Cigarettes After Sex have surprise-dropped a new single You're All I Want. it was recorded during the sessions for their album cry and is hopefully part of a new album coming soon.
release: You're All I Want was released on Partisan Records on May 26, 2020.

title: Woods - Strange To Explain
description: The Brooklyn based folk rock band Woods released their 11th studio album. It is less lo-fi than the previews ones.
release: Strange To Explain was released on singer and guitarist Jeremy Earl's label Woodsist on May 22, 2020.

title: Spirit Fest - Mirage Mirage
description: Spirit Fest are Saya and Takashi Ueno (Tenniscoats), Markus Acher (The Notwist, Rayon), Cico Beck (Aloa Input, The Notwist) and Mat Fowler (Jam Money, Bons). their third album Mirage Mirage contains 14 beautiful tracks.
release: Mirage Mirage was released on Morr Music on May 15, 2020.

title: Perfume Genius - Set My Heart On Fire Immediately
description: Set My Heart on Fire Immediately is the fifths album of Mike Hadreas. its 13 tracks are quite diverse, lyrics are honest and poetic.
release: Set My Heart On Fire Immediately was released on Matador Records on May 15, 2020.

title: I Break Horses - Warnings
description: I Break Horses released after 6 years, a crashed hard drive and failed collaborations a new album. Fredrik Balck joined songwriter Maria Lindén on drums.
release: Warnings was released on Bella Union on May 8, 2020.

title: Midwife - Forever
description: already a month old, but still worth sharing. Denver musician Madeline Johnston released her second album, she calls her music heaven metal.
release: Forever was released through The Flenser on April 10, 2020.

title: Mark Lanegan - Straight Songs Of Sorrow
description: The former Screaming Trees frontman. Queens of the Stone Age collaborator and friend of Kurt Cobain released his 12th solo album, Straight Songs Of Sorrow. his book Sing Backwards and Weep was released last week. he has clearly seen and experienced some shit in his life.
release: Straight Songs Of Sorrow was released through Heavenly Recordings on May 8, 2020.

title: Field Works - Ultrasonic
description: Stuart Hyatt, echolocations of bats, nature and many contributors.
release: Ultrasonic was released on Temporary Residence on May 1, 2020.

title: Ride, Pêtr Aleksänder - Clouds In The Mirror
description: London-based duo Pêtr Aleksänder (Tom Hobden, Noah & The Whale and Eliot James, Two Door Cinema Club) transformed Ride's album This Is Not A Safe Place into a new athmospheric piece.
release: Clouds In The Mirrow was released on Wichita Recordings on May 1, 2020.

title: Shards & Isolation Choir - Inside I'll Sing
description: London-based experimental vocal ensemble Shards teamed up with a couple of musicians and released Inside I'll Sing. their Isolation Choir consists of Douglas Dare, Joe Newman (Alt-J), Jonathan Donahue (Mercury Rev), Anna Meredith, New York-based composer Nico Muhly, Luke Howard, Hatis Noit and many more. proceeds will be donated.
release: Inside I'll Sing was released on Erased Tapes on April 17, 2020.

title: Other Lives - For Their Love
description: having experimented with electronic textues on their last album (Rituals, 2015), Other Lives went back to an analog setup for the new album. it was recorded in songwriter Jesse Tabish' new house somewhere in the rural Cooper Mountain region of Oregon.
release: For Their Love was released on ATO Records on April 24, 2020.

title: Die Wilde Jagd - Haut
description: 4 songs, 45 minutes.
release: Haut was released on Bureau B on April 17, 2020.

title: Slut - For The Soul There Is No Hospital
description: after seven silent years, Slut just released their new single For The Soul There Is No Hospital.

title: Chromatics - Teacher
description: Chromatics have released their new song Teacher and the tracklist for their upcoming album Dear Tommy. a few weeks ago they already released Faded Now, a suprise album which includes a few remixes of songs from Closer To Grey and a couple of new ones.
release: Teacher was released through Italians Do It Better on April 17, 2020.

title: Soap&Skin - What's up?
description: And another very beautiful cover by Anja Plaschg, aka Soap&Skin. she and her sister Evelyn just published a new interpretation of the 90s classic What's up by the 4 Non Blondes. and I pray, oh my god do I pray, I pray every single day, for a revolution.

title: Porridge Radio - Every Bad
description: "grantig", repetitive and from Brighton.
release: Every Bad was released on Secretly Canadian on March 13th, 2020.

title: M. Ward - Migration Stories
description: Migration Stories is M. Ward's (She & Him, Monsters of Folk) tenth studio release and was recorded at Arcarde Fire's Montreal studio.
release: it is his debut for ANTI records and was realeased on April 4, 2020.

title: Social Isolation
description: Created and compiled during the last week of March 2020, this compilation brings together the sound of artists in isolation creating music that's reflective of our collective struggle during the Covid-19 pandemic. Those featured in this edition are of Indian origin [src].

title: Daniel Avery, Alessandro Cortini - Illusion of Time
description: yet another dreamy and atmospheric new album. Daniel Avery and Alessandro Cortini (Nine Inch Nails) joined forces and remotely made an album full of distorted drones, warm synth pads, feedback loops and other weird noises.
release: Illusion of Time was released through Phantasy Sounds on March 27, 2020.

title: Pantha Du Prince - Conference of Trees
description: already a month ago, the German musician Hendrik Weber aka Pantha Du Prince released the new album Conference of Trees. it has been performed at several theatre gigs last year already. what does it sound like when trees communicate?
release: Conference of Threes was released through BMG's Modern Recordings on March 6, 2020.

title: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts V-VI
description: Nine Inch Nails released volumes five and six of their Ghosts series, subtitled Together and Locusts respectively. these two new releases are available for free on their website.
release: Ghosts V and VI were released on their label The Null Corporation on March 26, 2020.

title: Muzz - Broken Tambourine
description: Muzz was formed by Paul Banks (Interpol), Matt Barrick (the Walkmen, Fleet Foxes) and Josh Kaufman (Bonny Light Horseman, Day of the Dead). after dropping their first track Bad Feeling on SoundCloud earlier this month, the band now officially released their first single.
release: Broken Tambourine was released on Matador Records on March 24, 2020.

title: Nils Frahm - Empty
description: the eight-track lp was originally written as the soundtrack to a short film he shot with his friend Benoit Toulemonde.
release: Empty was released on Erased Types on piano day, March 28, 2020.

title: Sufjan Stevens and Lowell Brams - Aporia
description: Aporia is the new album of Sufjan Stevens and his stepfather Lowell Brams. it contains 21 ambient, instrumental tracks.
release: it was released through their label Asthmatic Kitty on March 24, 2020.
